entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
